title: Intuit Mailchimp
description: Mailchimp is an all-in-one marketing platform empowering businesses to connect with their audience to advanced email marketing, AI-driven insights, and powerful automations. Designed for growing businesses, Mailchimp helps you create personalized campaigns, analyze performance, and scale with ease, all backed by award-winning support. Build better customer relationships with over 300 integrations and tools tailored to your unique needs.
